Text:
Quit using EZTV. Their torrents won't connect to a tracker (TPB trackers are offline) which means slower download speeds through DHT.. All because they're too idle to include http://tracker.openbittorrent.com:80/announce in the torrents.
Try VTV: https://thepiratebay.org/user/VTV/
or AiTB: https://thepiratebay.org/user/AiTB/
or xsaimex: https://thepiratebay.org/user/xsaimex/
After watching the first two episodes, I may forget to watch the next.
